blogPost.excerpt: Letterloop lets you create private group newsletters with friends and family. Stay in touch, grow closer together, and discover things you never knew with the most important people in your life — all over email. ⠀ Get started at letterloop.co
blogPost.body: Letterloop lets you create private group newsletters with friends and family. Stay in touch, grow closer together, and discover things you never knew with the most important people in your life — all over email. ⠀ Get started at letterloop.co
blogPost.title: Letterloop - Create group newsletters with friends and family. ✍️
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Letterloop允许您与朋友和家人创建私人群组时事通讯。与生活中最重要的人保持联系，拉近距离，通过电子邮件发现你从来不知道的事情。⠀入门网址为letterloop.co
localize.tagline: 与朋友和家人一起创建群组时事通讯。✍️

localize.description: Letterloop允許您與朋友和家人創建私人羣組時事通訊。與生活中最重要的人保持聯繫，拉近距離，通過電子郵件發現你從來不知道的事情。⠀入門網址爲letterloop.co
localize.tagline: 與朋友和家人一起創建羣組時事通訊。✍️

previous.excerpt: Stop spending a lot of time searching templates for documents in multiple sectors including IT, Business, HR, Legal, Medicine, Education, and Finance. Use Fastdok to generate ready-to-use documents that work in minutes by answering a few questions.
previous.title: Fastdok - Generate documents that work in a few minutes

localize.description: 停止花费大量时间在多个部门(包括IT、商业、人力资源、法律、医疗、教育和金融)的模板中搜索文档。使用Fastdok生成即用型文档，只需回答几个问题，即可在几分钟内完成工作。
localize.tagline: 生成只需几分钟即可工作的文档

localize.description: 停止花費大量時間在多個部門(包括IT、商業、人力資源、法律、醫療、教育和金融)的模板中搜索文檔。使用Fastdok生成即用型文檔，只需回答幾個問題，即可在幾分鐘內完成工作。
localize.tagline: 生成只需幾分鐘即可工作的文檔

next.excerpt: gSweets slash commands save you time, and keep you in a state of flow. Our first batch of shortcuts let you format text, add screenshots, and search emojis, GIFs, and stock photos. Add it to Chrome for free today. Designed to be 100% private.
next.title: gSweets - Save time in Google Docs with Notion-like shortcuts

localize.description: gSwets劈开命令可以节省您的时间，并让您保持流畅的状态。我们的第一批快捷方式可以让你格式化文本、添加截图、搜索表情符号、GIF和库存照片。今天就把它免费添加到Chrome中吧。设计成100%私密的。
localize.tagline: 使用类似概念的快捷方式在Google Docs中节省时间

localize.description: gSwets劈開命令可以節省您的時間，並讓您保持流暢的狀態。我們的第一批快捷方式可以讓你格式化文本、添加截圖、搜索表情符號、GIF和庫存照片。今天就把它免費添加到Chrome中吧。設計成100%私密的。
